title: Acorn Squash Soup
directions: Put squash into a baking dish with the cut side down. Pour enough water into the baking dish to cover the bottom.

Bake in preheated oven until the flesh of the squash is easily pricked with a fork, about 2 hours. Remove from oven and allow to cool until squash can be handled. Scoop flesh into a bowl and set aside.
Melt butter in a pot over medium-high heat. Cook onion, carrot, and garlic and jalapeno in melted butter until soft, 5 to 7 minutes. Pour veg stock into the pot; add the squash.
Stir, and bring the mixture to a simmer and cook for 20 minutes.
Puree in batches in blender until smooth.
Stir cream, nutmeg, and cinnamon through the blended soup; season with salt and pepper.
